title_short: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas
description: We pay 3€ to Park during the day and we where able to use the money in the bar. We spent the day.

title: (36626) - s/n Barrio as Aceñas
description: Plan between trees on the beach, touching a campsite and near a nightclub. (loud music is heard until 2 in the morning approx). The rest is perfect.

name: Camping Salinas
title: (36626) Camping Salinas
description: Camping Salinas (2 stars), but with the bare essentials. Very clean bathrooms. Friendly and pleasant welcome. Direct access to the beach. The only downside I saw is the lack of closing time for the children's area, because if you have an adjacent property and want to sleep early you will have a hard time until around 12pm. Beach bar attached to the campsite and others along the beautiful 2 km long beach walk. Barbecue area with approx. 5 places.

address.street: Playa de Xestelas, Barrio as Aceñas, s/n

title: (36626) Isla de Arosa - 30 EP-9802
description: 2 places end of the road at the foot of the sea

title: (36191) - 3 Lugar a Maquieira
description: Large parking lot with shadows. There are restaurants, two hiking trails, public restrooms, garbage cans, and WELLS. Impressive waterfalls with bath area and jacuzzi pools. Lots of picnic tables. A lot of shade.

title: (36626) Isla de Arosa -
description: Parking for motorhomes and campers in a heavenly place. In this parking lot that borders the sea there is a tidal mill. Beaches and coves in the area.

title: (36692) Barro - 42 Lugar Fonte de Curro
description: Gas station with emptying and filling of water

title: (15992) Boiro - 125 Rúa Principal
description: Self-service laundry and DIA Supermarket

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 29B Lugar As Aceñas
title_short: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 29B Lugar As Aceñas
description: It is a street that ends in a pavilion, which goes down to the cove or accesses the viewpoint, there is room to park a total of about 6 - 8, plus a motorhome, it is paved and the upper area is level, right next to where those from Arenoso beach rent the canoes, which have a pine forest that they let you park if you rent a canoe to go to arenoso

title: (15930) Boiro - 16 Aldea Boiro
description: Drinking water point

title: (36653) Caldas de Reyes - PO-221
description: Parking in nature next to a reservoir. there is a climbing area five minutes away and a route to the mills. there is a viewpoint to a waterfall nearby. the descent is dirt and there are some potholes, you have to be careful. views of the lake from the reservoir. passes a nearby road but sleeps well

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas
title_short: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas
description: Beautiful picnic area with incomparable scenery.

title: (36692) Barro - 22 Lugar Fonte de Curro
description: Small parking lot in which we spend the night without any problem, in front there is a furancho in which we eat octopus, saw, etc. rich and at a good price

title: (36191) Barro -
description: Superb point of view. You can park at the level of the church on a small vacant lot. away from the crowds of the waterfall a bit further down. absolute calm!

title: (36191) Porráns - 12
description: Parking at the beginning of the excursions; with the river, picnic area and playground. There is also a restaurant. Very quiet and mountain atmosphere. The ground is slightly sloping but bearable.

title: (15992) Boiro - 44 Aldea Magdalena
description:
Very cozy and quiet, ideal for families with children. The town is very close and has good shade, a picnic area and a park for children's games.

INSTRUCTIONS:
1 Approach the barrier so that it opens.
2 Park.
3 Go to the payment machine, enter the days of stay.
4 Pay with credit/debit card.

title: (15982) A Coruña - AG-11
description: Free water filling

title: (36653) Caldas de Reyes - 4 PO-221
description: Very quiet recreational area, although somewhat abandoned, such as the picnic tables and the playground. Even so, it is a good place to stop along the way. There is also a tennis and basketball court. From here starts a 1.2km circular route that goes around the peninsula that goes into the reservoir. We have not slept but it seems to be a good place for it.

title: (15992) Boiro - 92 Urbanización Escarabote
description: Port of Escarabote. Quiet place. Has a water fountain. On the other side, next to a bus stop, it has a small beach with a shower and a chemical toilet. Very central. Space for several vehicles.

title: (15992) Boiro - 49 Lugar Peralto
description: Super equipped laundry!! I pay both in cash and by card. Very comfortable service. The area is very nice and pleasant to wait while doing the laundry. Very good prices. It has a bakery opposite, a playground and cafeterias next door. Highly recommended.

title: (36636) Ribadumia - 16 Rúa Outeiral
description: Playground with area to park and rest. Drinking water source and beautiful view of a eucalyptus forest. Some bar or restaurant nearby. With hardly any traffic.

title: (15938) Bermo - 11 Aldea Bermo
description: Showers in the Shell service station restaurant. important for vans. very friendly staff.

title: (36647) Valga - Unnamed Road
description: Top location, quiet,lovely,....and lonely,but we like. water available. bar likely closed for a wile

title: (36647) Valga - 13 Lugar Carballa
description:
Ample parking with some flat places to sleep.
It has no services, but it is next to the town with a cafeteria and bakery very close.
It has a small soccer and basketball court in the same parking lot.

title: (36194) Barro - 1 Lugar San Antoniño
description: Ground parking next to the Pazo da Crega. Area without services. In some areas there is a bit of unevenness. General road about 200 meters so some cars can be heard

title: (15949) Areos -
description: Space for four or 5 small vans in the middle of nature, with a small cove and views of the estuary.

title: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - Aldea Cabío
title_short: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - Aldea Cabío
description: Esplanade with picnic tables and a cement barbecue. Quite closed with trees, collected and shaded. Very nice flirt and with access on foot to beaches in the area. 500 meters from beach bars. It does not have any services, nor showers, nor water intake. Perfect place to spend the night without any problem.

title: (36639) Cambados - Unnamed Road
description: Praia de Correlo, on the shore of the river. Views to the island of La Toja. Plain, of land and next to a forest and vineyards.

title: (36675) - 28 Rua San Ildefonso
description: Large parking in the shade with a lot of table to make a good little pose with a bar in front and a water point

name: Camping Ria De Arosa I
title: (15949) Camping Ria De Arosa I
description: Camping near the sea. Beautiful scenery. Do not come with a motorhome longer than 7.50 m. Good for spending one or two days, far from shops, sanitary facilities, clean, wifi throughout the campsite, free

title: (36639) Cambados - 55 Lugar Facho
description: Seaside. No beach fishing and stroll possible. quiet place we. no service.

title: (36991) O Grove - 1 Rua Carreiro
description: Parking without restrictions in front of the golf club. Suitable for campers under 6 meters. Convenient to visit Grobits park quickly.  Continue towards the end of the island authorized parking

title: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 4 Rua 1 Lombiña
title_short: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 4 Rua 1 Lombiña
description: Ground parking with shade, very saturated on weekends, a very nice beach with beach bars and restaurants, public toilets.

title: (36660) Moraña - 3 Rúa N 6
description: Great area, it looks like a fairground, next to Repsol gas station in the center of town, very quiet

title: (36645) Raxoi - Unnamed Road
description: Waterfalls and hiking trail. Next to where you park there is a waterfall where you can swim. Access is rather for campers, narrow for AC. Access is two-way and it is better to try to go before nightfall, spend the night and enjoy the place the next day. Garbage container next to the car park.

title: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 4 Rúa San Lázaro
title_short: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 4 Rúa San Lázaro
description: Parking next to the pier, large sites and very quiet, town center 5 minutes away

title: (36639) Cambados - 64 Lugar Facho
description: Good place to spend a night. Access by dirt road, motorhomes without problem.

title: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 59 Lugar Laxe
title_short: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 59 Lugar Laxe
description: Parking next to the beach with plenty of shade. They charge €5 for motorhomes (€10 for staying overnight). It does not have any service, only parking.

title: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 13 Rúa San Lázaro
title_short: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 13 Rúa San Lázaro
description: Parking with site almost always.

title: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 14 Aldea Laxe
title_short: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 14 Aldea Laxe
description: Private motorhome area located 400m from the beach, totally closed plot and guarded 24 hours. Electricity in pitches, toilets with hot water in showers, sinks, washing machine, barbecue area, completely flat pitches. A great place to spend a few days of relaxation and tranquility in an unbeatable environment. CHECK-IN To check-in you need ID and credit card. It is done using an automatic machine where, if the instructions are followed correctly, it is a simple process: 1. Select the number of nights you want to spend the night. 2. Choose the plot, (check size) and if you need electricity or not. 3. Scan your ID (place the document photo face up) and press READ. 4. Press pay to make the payment. 5. Make the payment with your card by passing it through the reader or entering it in the dataphone (marking your pin on it) The machine will issue you your payment ticket, ticket with information about the plot and the access card, which you have to go through the reader located at the barriers to enter. With this card you can enter and leave the area as many times as you want during your stay. RENEWAL OF STAY: If you want to renew your stay, make a check out in the machine before ending the current stay (options - checkout) Then make a new check-in.

title: (36639) Cambados - 66 Lugar Facho
description: Quiet location, beach shower nearby, no service, no waves

title: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 3 Rua Castelao
title_short: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 3 Rua Castelao
description: Large parking area but quite busy. Ideal to visit A Pobra for the day and enjoy the area of bars and restaurants. We do not sleep in this place (we do not know if you can either)

title: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - Aldea Laxe
title_short: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - Aldea Laxe
description: Bay parking next to very quiet road next to beach. showers but no services. many beautiful beaches within walking didtance and many bars and seafood restaurants on the other beaches. the parking bays are quite small and the roads to the beach are also very small...if you go wrong...highly recommended for smaller vans and campers. no signs prohibiting motorhomes or overnight parking. busy on weekends

title: (36989) O Grove - 58 Rúa Castelao
description: Laundry

title: (36991) O Grove - 1 Rúa Don Pedro
description: Area under pine forest with lots of shade next to the bridge. Perfect for spending the day. At the entrance there is a sign prohibited except shellfish and guards, but in truth it is the parking lot of the nearby beach bar and the beach.

title: (36980) El Grove - 2 Rúa Alexandre Bóveda
description: Perfect laundry. 3 washing machines of 12.15 and 20 kg. 3 dryers Coin change, drinking water available. Very clean and tidy place. Very affordable prices. The only flaw is the lack of parking.

title: (36639) Sartaxes - 7 Lugar Sartages
description: Facing the sea, beautiful view, quiet, a beach shower but not working (covid). Van 10m from the water. Perfect for the night.

title: (36192) Armenteira - 53B Lugar a Vilar
description: Pilgrims hostel parking. Always accessible. Great place to see the monastery. Bar O Comercio, potato omelette. Not leveled. Drinking water is available.

title: (36989) O Grove - 15 Pasaje Monte Da Vila
title_short: (36989) O Grove - 15 Pasaje Monte Da Vila
description: Parking of the soccer field where there is usually room during the summer season because there is no soccer or school. To park near the center without being fined. To park and see the the perfect grove.

title: (36192) Pontevedra - Unnamed Road
description: Golf parking and departure of a mountain bike circuit of 7km (easy). I went to ask the reception of golf, which is also Info VTT, if there was opportunity to spend the night on the parking to do the circuit in the morning, and allowed me without any problem.

title: (36991) Isla de La Toja - s/n Paseo do Mar
title_short: (36991) Isla de La Toja - s/n Paseo do Mar
description: Parking next to the Louxo hotel. It's not much, but staying overnight if you're in the area is fine.

title: (36991) O Grove - Paseo do Mar
description: Parking with lots of space, there are parking lots for buses that can use large motorhomes, there are no services but these are next to where you take the tourist train and 5 minutes walk to the Toja Museum.

title: (36192) Armenteria - 3 Lugar a Caroi
description: Small car park, perfect for visiting the monastery and for mountain bike departures

title: (15917) Padrón - Unnamed Road
description: Rest area at the mouth of the Sar in the Ulla, ample parking for overnight, with picnic tables. Little care and a little away from the village.

title: (36989) O Grove - 89 Rúa Teniente Domínguez
description: Parking area next to the estuary, with a children's park and a fountain. Very quiet place even if early in the morning there is a little movement when shellfish come to slaughterhouse

title: (36989) Ardia - Unnamed Road
description: Place to spend the night in a camper, next to skateboarding tracks, sunrise views of the estuary, space for one or two campers maximum. But behind it has parking.

title: (15981) A Igrexa - DP-3302
description: Public picnic areas with barbecue area.

title: (36639) Cambados - Aldea o Facho
description: Ample parking space where Antea was a playground. Next to a soccer field and right by the sea. Quiet sleeping place under maple trees.

title: (15959) Insuela - 14 Rúa Esteirón
description: Land parking to spend the day

title: (15959) Insuela - 2 Rúa Esteirón
description: Very nice picnic area overlooking the bay and the beach!

title: (36995) - 2 Camino A Escusa
description: Forest of secouyas. Fantastic views over the Ria de Pontevedra. Ideal place to rest and stroll in a forest of redwoods.

title: (36151) Pontevedra - 38 PO-224
description: Quiet spot for sleeping near small children's games and picnic area / barbecue

title: (36151) Pontevedra - 38 PO-224
description: Parking at the reservoir at the sports facility. Quiet location, good for staying one night. All around a lot of forest, picnic area with playground on the other side of the road. Walking on the lake possible.

title: (36151) Pontevedra - 38 PO-224
description: At the edge of the lake and with possibility of having shade. No service. You can swim. Nice, but a little narrow path and beware of mosquitoes ... (in July)

title: (36988) San Vicente - 1 Lugar Gandariña
description: Parking to visit the Punta Moreias lighthouse during the day there are quite a few walkers ... at night very quiet, there is no service but you can easily enter the sea and there is an area of fairly smooth rocks to fish, we have visited it in August. Parking has some cost.

title: (15948) A Aldea Vella - CP-6705
description: Next to the main parking lot of A curotiña, next to a horse trough on the ground. Magnificent view and close to the RP.02B path (which connects with A and with PRG263).

title: (15900) Padrón - Travesía Feira
description: Area with all motorhome services and a large parking lot, no places reserved for motorhomes. 200 meters from the center of the city with all services. Villa which is the birthplace of St. James, landmarks great tradition of pilgrimage and 20 km from Santiago de Compostela and served by regular public transport. A great literary culture credited to the house-museum of Rosalia de Castro and Camilo Jose Foundation Cela.Gran. Variety of local cuisine (Padron peppers, lamprey, octopus ...)

name: Camping las Moreiras
title: (36988) Camping las Moreiras
description: Very small plots. Decent bathrooms and services. Noisy camp at night, until 00:00 there were children playing and shouting a lot.

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: Amazing place to visit. Beautiful views

title: (36988) - 20 Lugar Gandariña
description: Small parking lot next to a cove nice quiet place to spend the day we were there in April it was empty

title: (15900) Padrón - 3 Rúa Porta Fondo da Vila
title_short: (15900) Padrón - 3 Rúa Porta Fondo da Vila
description: Simple city car park located 200m from a service area. Immediate proximity to the city. Many non-specific CC spaces. Convenient for going to the restaurant or shopping. Night not prohibited except market days to be verified.

title: () Meaño - Aldea Altamira
description: Outdoor parking between trees and pond, near a kind of museum. Access from a dirt road accessible to CC. Nice point of view and free dump station nearby (see on park4night map)

title: (15900) Padrón - 11 Avenida Pontecesures
description: Large public car park in a meadow with trees. Very quiet location at the entrance to Padrón.

title: (36967) A Eirexe - 3 Rúa Ramón Cabanillas
description: Free parking. Very large, many seats. Semi-asphalted ground, completely level. Very calm. Supermarket, laundry, restaurants, bars, etc. It does not have loading and unloading of water. Perfect for a stop along the way

title: (15910) Padrón - 76 Aldea Extramundi de Arriba
description: Santiaguiño do Monte recreation area. Source Castañar Barbecue Very quiet. You can go down to Padrón by the staircase along the wall of the monastery.

title: (36967) Meaño - 10T Lugar Altamira
description: Os Pasales recreational area. 15 large parking spaces for vans, among shady trees. On the side of the area, next to the road, they can fit 2 AC parked in line. In the area there is a soccer field, paddle tennis court, 2 taps, stone tables and grills, benches, wastebaskets, and a wooden box with books to read (please put them back in their place). Gray discharge area a few meters next to the treatment plant.

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: Mirador parking with magnificent views of the sea and Arousa Island. You can go up again, for the landscape and sleep under the pines

title: (15900) Padrón - 7 Rúa Enlace Parque
description: Laundrymat

title: (36967) Meaño - 12 Aldea Altamira
description: Gray and black water drainage area only, in the Dena area nearby you have a place to rest, a playground, a river walk and two minutes from supermarkets and cafes. The bin doesn’t get emptied very often so please empty any rubbish with food waste elsewhere so as not to attract lots of flies.

title: (36988) - 6 Lugar Gandariña
description: Quiet place on the beach where to spend the night, in mid-September there was no problem sleeping in the van. there are areas with shade in the morning, public toilets that close at night, and several beach bars where you can have a drink, it is not crowded but at rush hour it can be difficult to park

title: (36677) Cuntis - EP-8403
description: Area with tables to eat in the shade. Large parking area where you could sleep.

title: (15948) A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description:
Esplanade next to a path next to the highway.
surrounded by trees and cows. in front there are wind farm mills.

title: (36988) El Grove - 16 As Pipas
description: Place to spend the day and night. There is space for 4 vans or motorhomes. Right in front of the beach.

title: (15900) Padrón - 27 Avenida de Compostela
description: Parking near the Padrón market where you can spend the night, it has no services but you have access to the whole town on foot. Right next to it is a park.
